Jimi Solanke Listen (amụrụ na Julaị 1942) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme egwuregwu, onye na'agụ egwú, onye na - na-ede abụ na onye na-ede egwuregwu.Listen (help·info)
Solanke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo nzere diplọma na ihe nkiri.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Solanke kwagara na United States, ebe o mepụtara otu ihe nkiri a na-akpọ "The Africa Review", na-elekwasị anya na ọdịbendị Afrịka
Ndị otu a na-eyikarị uwe Africa, ọkachasị uwe Yoruba
Ha rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị isi ojii Afrika. Solanke guzobere onwe ya na Los Angeles, California, ebe ọrụ ịkọ akụkọ ya malitere
CNN kọwara ya dị ka "onye na-akọ akụkọ"

N'afọ 1986, ya na ndị otu Ndị Nyocha Afrịka atọ laghachiri Naịjirịa iji soro ndị Nigerian Television Authority rụọ ọrụ.
Aha ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ola Balogun. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mere ihe nkiri nke" Kongi's Harvest" nke onye Nobel Laureate bụ Wole Soyinka.
